TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ColumnHierarchyUsage extends DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Spreadsheet.HierarchyUsageType

summary.para: This class is available in Office 2007 and above.
When the object is serialized out as xml, it's qualified name is x:colHierarchyUsage.

remarks.format:
## Remarks [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlnoticeiso.md)] **colHierarchyUsage (Column OLAP Hierarchies)** Represents the collection of references to OLAP Hierarchies on the column axis of a PivotTable. *[Example:* \ *end example*] |Parent Elements| |---------------------| |colHierarchiesUsage (§18.10.1.15)| |Attributes|Description| |----------------|-----------------| |hierarchyUsage (Hierarchy Usage)|Specifies the reference to an OLAP hierarchy in a PivotTable.

The possible values for this attribute are defined by the W3C XML Schema *int* datatype.| [*Note*: The W3C XML Schema definition of this element’s content model (CT_HierarchyUsage) is located in §A.2. *end note*] [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlcopyrightiso.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ColumnHierarchyUsage class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class DocumentFormat.OpenXml.OpenXmlElement CloneNode(bool deep) cil managed
Public Overrides Function CloneNode (deep As Boolean) As OpenXmlElement

Docs.param: true to recursively clone the subtree under the specified node; false to clone only the node itself.
Docs.summary: Creates a duplicate of this node.
